snippet: The company had already delayed its offering a day while it assessed the fallout from Walmart’s lowered sales forecasts.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online; supermarket chain Albertsons postpones its planed initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: The company had already delayed its offering a day while it assessed the fallout from Walmart’s lowered sales forecasts.

headline.main: Albertsons Postpones I.P.O. Plans for the Time Being
